TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssemblyCatalog extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement
Public Class AssemblyCatalog Inherits ComposablePartCatalog Implements ICompositionElement
type AssemblyCatalog = class inherit ComposablePartCatalog interface ICompositionElement

summary.span: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.

span.span: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來剖析所有組件存在於指定的組件。An is used to parse all the parts present in a specified assembly. 物件參考或路徑，可以指示的目標組件。The target assembly can be indicated either by object reference or by path. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 此型別具備執行緒安全。This type is thread safe. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何建立應用程式的常見的案例剖析它自己組件。The following code demonstrates the common scenario of an application creating an to parse its own assembly. 這是載入組件包含在單一專案中 Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) 至直接的方法。This is a straightforward way to load parts contained in a single project into the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF). [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]
